content.description: The main body content of the article.

authorId.description: The unique identifier of the author (user) who wrote the article.

createdAt.description: The date and time when the article was created.

updatedAt.description: The date and time when the article was last updated.

image.description: A URL pointing to an image associated with the article.

category.description: The category under which the article is classified.

href.description: The URL to the related resource.

method.description: HTTP method to use for the link (GET, POST, DELETE, etc.).

links.description: Links to related resources and actions.
